summary: Actively seeking full time opportunities from December 2019.

experience.title: Information Technology and AWS Admin Intern
experience.description: Researched and implemented a secure cloud infrastructure for migrating the financial data into AWS with seamless integration for company's financial department. Achieved an overall increment of 30% in efficiency by migrating the company's infrastructure to AWS cloud. Reduced the company's infrastructure cost by 10 times. Implemented secure off-site backups through scheduled weekly SSH dumps to remote server. Configured and troubleshot switches, routers and firewalls using TCP/IP protocols.

experience.title: Network Engineer Intern
